channel.title: Thread-5 Error [PI]
channel.description:
I got this error after adding the new model header to exion client :(
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 56343 at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:410) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8357) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1896) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8152) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Fix?

item.title: Thread-5 Error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Niv3k Niv3k
item.description:
@Niv3k wrote:

I got this error after adding the new model header to exion client

Exception in thread “Thread-5” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 56343
at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:410)
at client.drawInterface(client.java:8357)

at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8152)

at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
at client.run(client.java:4689)
